Title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
Writer: André Cayatte (screenplay "Le Miroir a Deux Faces"), Gérard Oury (screenplay "Le Miroir a Deux Faces"), Richard LaGravenese (screen story), Richard LaGravenese (screenplay)
Actors: Barbra Streisand, Jeff Bridges, Lauren Bacall, George Segal
Plot: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 9 nominations.
